parts.text: {"word":"negligere","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(ラテン語)無視する、軽視する、怠る","english_definition":"(Latin) to neglect, disregard, be indifferent to, slight, not care for.","examples":[{"sentence":"Rem publicam neglegere.","translation":"国家を無視する。","note":"(Classical Latin)"},{"sentence":"Deos neglegere.","translation":"神々を軽視する。","note":"(Classical Latin)"},{"sentence":"Salus aegroti neglegitur.","translation":"患者の健康が怠られている。","note":"(Vulgate Latin)"}],"collocations":["rem publicam neglegere (国家を無視する)","deos neglegere (神々を軽視する)","salutem neglegere (健康を怠る)","officium neglegere (義務を怠る)","praecepta neglegere (教訓を無視する)"],"synonyms":["contemnere","spernere","despicere","omittere","praetermittere"],"antonyms":["curare","attendere","observare","colere","diligere"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Proto-Italic *nek-leg-e- > *ne-legere, from ne- ('not') + legere ('to gather, pick, read'). Thus, literally 'not to pick up' or 'not to care The entry provides a definition, examples, and related words to help understand its meaning and usage."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Milites officia sua neglexerunt.","translation":"兵士たちは自分たちの義務を怠った。","type":"example","meaning_category":"neglecting duties"},{"sentence":"Philosophi Epicurei deos neglegunt.","translation":"エピクロス派の哲学者たちは神々を軽視する。","type":"example","meaning_category":"disregarding gods"},{"sentence":"Negligere praecepta parentum stultum est.","translation":"両親の教えを無視するのは愚かだ。","type":"example","meaning_category":"ignoring advice"}]}
